AR 36. Land cover is a typical variable that can be assessed with earth observation data.
AR 37. When reporting on material impacts related to the ecosystems, the undertaking may, in
addition to the extent and condition of ecosystems, also consider the functioning of
ecosystems by using:
(a) a metric that measures a process or function that the ecosystem completes, or that
reflects the ability of the ecosystem to undertake that specific process or function:
